Author: BEDBulimic
Text: Don't romanticise eating disorders, do not come here posting content as though EDs are some kind of achievement to unlock or a magic cure for losing weight. We do not allow posts about "ana buddies" or people who don't have EDs and are "[wannarexics](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wannarexia)".   This sub is used for emotional support for those suffering with EDs, and your post would be considered very tone-deaf, insensitive and ignorant by the community.  This is your only warning, similar action in the future will warrant a ban. Thanks
